meta.title: Game4FunPCS First PC Guide: Power Up Like a Pro

sections.content: Welcome to the Game4FunPCS family! Whether this is your first custom-built rig or your long-awaited upgrade, you’ve entered the elite world of PC gaming—and we’re here to make sure your experience is smooth, powerful, and unforgettable.

sections.title: Prepare Your Space
items: Clear and clean your desk (especially where the PC will sit)
Get your monitor, keyboard, mouse, and headset ready

sections.title: Check Internet Connection
items: Most gaming desktops do not include Wi-Fi by default
If no built-in Wi-Fi: use a USB dongle (TP-Link with antenna is best)

sections.title: Inspect Before Opening
items: Look for damage on the shipping box
Take pictures if any visible damage

sections.title: Inside the Box
items: Keep original packaging for returns or future moves

sections.title: Full Visual Check
items: No loose cables or visible damage?
If anything seems off — contact Game4FunPCS Support

sections.title: Connect Peripherals
items: Plug keyboard, mouse, headset into USB
Plug monitor into GPU (middle/lower ports), not motherboard

sections.title: Power On
items: Flip PSU switch on back to “I” (not “O”)
Press power button on front/top of case

sections.title: Windows Setup
items: If Windows doesn’t boot → Contact support

sections.title: Storage Check
items: C:\ Drive = SSD boot drive (e.g. 500GB or 1TB)
D:\ or E:\ = Extra drive (HDD, SSD, NVMe)

sections.title: Remove Bloatware
items: Uninstall junk (McAfee, Norton, Office trial, etc.)

sections.title: Windows Update
items: Start > Windows Update > Check for Updates
Install and restart until fully up-to-date

sections.title: Enable RAM Speeds
items: Ctrl + Shift + Esc > Task Manager > Performance > Memory
If RAM isn’t running at full speed: Reboot > Tap DEL to enter BIOS

sections.title: Update Graphics Drivers
items: NVIDIA: GeForce Experience → Drivers → Check Updates
AMD: Adrenalin Software → Update tab → Restart after install

sections.title: Enable Game Mode
items: Windows + I > Gaming > Game Mode > ON

sections.title: Monitor Tweaks
items: Settings > Display > Advanced > Refresh Rate > Max
On monitor OSD: Enable FreeSync/G-Sync, Overdrive, Game Mode

sections.title: Power Settings
items: Control Panel > Power Options > Ultimate Performance

sections.title: In-Game Settings
items: Resolution: Native preferred, reduce for FPS boost
Post-processing: Turn off Motion Blur, Depth of Field
Enable Hardware GPU Scheduling (Settings > Display > Graphics)
Change DNS: 8.8.8.8 or 1.1.1.1 for speed boost
Enable Resizable BAR in BIOS (if supported)
MSI Afterburner – Fan curves, temp overlay

sections.title: Every 6 Months
items: Run Cinebench or 3DMark again for performance check

sections.title: Yearly
items: Consider fresh Windows install for max performance

sections.content: Congratulations on your new system! Whether you’re grinding ranked, creating content, or just chilling with friends—your Game4FunPCS rig was built to deliver. Keep this guide handy, tune up monthly, and game hard.
